body.p: A sample framework that uses Google Maps to show and edit some attribute values representing coordinates.
body.div:
How to test it, after installing:
Open the file form-controls/travel-guide/travel-guide.xml from Oxygen's samples directory.
Scroll to the Points of Interest section.
Each point of interest has an address. Next to each address there is an action. Click the action.
A form control will appear and will present the coordinates on map. Using right click you can move the marker. The address text and attributes will be updated.
